data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Siɛgi zu GALA goo wo nui Natan liini la Davide ʋɔ bɛ, pilɛgai ma Ɓate-Seɓa ʋolu.
Ee, GALA, màawɔinɠa ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai maaʋele ma,
Gbà ga pagɔ, è kùla nà-faaɠaaza golaiti su,
Mazɔlɔɔ gè nà-tɔ koloɠologiti kwɛɛ,
Ɗa ɠa gè kotoi ɠɛai è laalɔɠɔma, ɗa ɠila kpe è laalɔɠɔma,
Wɛlɛ, sɔ̀lɔɔgɛ faaɠaaza golai zu,
Kɛlɛ, gaamai é nui yiimaʋɛ, naa ɠa nɛai è ʋɛ,
Ɲàde ga ɠizɔɔpe tufa ɓifɔgi,51:9 Ɲàde ga ɠizɔɔpe tufa ɓifɔgi: Wɛlɛ ʋɛ: Lev 14:4. nà ɠole naazu,
Koozunɛɛi ta ziilɛi fai wo mà,
Ɠaazuzeɠe nà-kotoiti ba,
Ee, GALA, zii ʋagɔi ɓɛtɛ kòozu,
Mina pìli ya, è ʋa màaɠooza,
Ɗa-ɠizo fai ma ɠoozunɛɛi ve zèa,
Niiti ti ga tɔ koloɠolo nuiti, nà naati kala ga ɗa-ʋeleiti,
Ee, GALA, nà-kizo GALAGI!
Màliɠii, dàkɔlɔgiti buzeɠe,
Mazɔlɔɔ zalaɠai la ga è yiilɛi gani,
Zalaɠa ɠila kpegi soloogai GALA ma,
Ɗa-nuɓɔɠɔlai zu, faa ʋagɔiti kɛ Siyɔn taa wolai ʋɛ,
Naazu, è yiima zalaɠaiti ta ɠula,
